trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Fredericton
There were no other sightings in Fredericton on or around October 10th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsAt about 8 p.m on October 10, 2013 my husband, his sister and her partner were star gazing on our deck. They called me out. A steady, bright white light to the south was moving from west to east in a straight line. After about 2 minutes it faded, got smaller and disappeared. After about 5 minutes the same light or another similar light appeared to the southwest moving east. It, too, faded, got smaller and disappeared. I knew this wasn't a plane or satellite because it was too bright and there was no blinking. After I saw the light, I watched it steadily in case it suddenly vanished or turned or changed in any way. While outside we saw two satellits and several jets. All of these appeared smaller than the lights we saw and farther up.
Summary: Saw steady, bright white light in the south moving west to east in straight line. After about 2 minutes it faded, got smaller and disappeared. After 5 minutes another or same light appeared and did the same.
